Class ServerSide.WordList

java.lang.Object
ServerSide.WordList
Enclosing class:
ServerSide
public class ServerSide.WordList extends Object
Manages a list of words, including loading them from a database, and provides functionality for word validation and selection.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WordList(String dataSource)
    Constructs a WordList, initializing the database connection and loading words from the specified data source.

  • Method Summary

    Method

    Retrieves the currently active word array.

    Loads words from the database into the words list.

  • Constructor Details

    • WordList

      public WordList(String dataSource)
      Constructs a WordList, initializing the database connection and loading words from the specified data source.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - The path or identifier for the data source used by SQLite.

  • Method Details

    • loadWordsFromDB

      public void loadWordsFromDB()
      Loads words from the database into the words list. Each word entry is a string array representing the word in different languages.

    • validateWord

      public boolean validateWord(String word)
      Validates if the given word matches any word in the currentWord array.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the word matches any language version of the current word, false otherwise.

    • getWordSelection

      public ArrayList<String[]> getWordSelection()
      Randomly selects a set of 3 unique words from the list.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of String arrays, each containing word representations in different languages.

    • setCurrentWord

      public void setCurrentWord(String[] word)
      Sets the currently active word array.
      Parameters:
      word - An array of strings representing the same word in different languages.

    • getCurrentWord

      public String[] getCurrentWord()
      Retrieves the currently active word array.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the current word in different languages.
